nodes.description: 周一晚间拉合尔奥托布尔路停车场发生卡车爆炸
nodes.support_text: when an explosion occurred in a truck at a parking stand on Outfall Road on Monday evening.

nodes.description: 爆炸导致46人受伤（4人重伤）并损毁超100辆车辆
nodes.support_text: Up to 46 people were injured... damaged, partially or heavily, more than 100 vehicles.

nodes.description: 爆炸冲击波使3-4辆汽车弹飞10-15英尺，附近建筑窗户破裂
nodes.support_text: three or four cars parked by the truck went airborne about 10 to 15 feet... windowpanes of a nearby building were also shattered.

nodes.description: 学校屋顶因爆炸倒塌，4公里半径内听到巨响
nodes.support_text: the roof of a school building... collapsed... The blast was heard in several areas... within a radius of four to five kilometres.

nodes.description: 132千伏高压电线损坏导致区域停电
nodes.support_text: the high voltage wires (132kV)... were damaged leaving the area in darkness.

nodes.description: 警方初步调查卡车载有从斯瓦特运往拉合尔的杏干
nodes.support_text: the initial investigation suggested that the truck was carrying crates of apricot being transported from Swat to the city.

nodes.description: 确认卡车内藏有大量爆炸物，正在评估具体重量
nodes.support_text: a huge cache of explosives had been stored in the truck... trying to assess the exact weight of the explosives.

nodes.description: 伤者被送往两家医院，12人经处理后出院
nodes.support_text: The injured were taken to Services and Mian Munshi hospitals from where 12 of them were discharged after first aid.

nodes.description: 4名重伤者被转至梅奥医院重症监护
nodes.support_text: Four people suffering life-threatening injuries were admitted to the Mayo Hospital.

nodes.description: 警方推测爆炸物可能用于袭击城市其他区域
nodes.support_text: the attackers might have been intending to transport the explosives to other areas of the city.

nodes.description: 救援人员发现爆炸现场形成10-15英尺深坑洞
nodes.support_text: the powerful explosion left a 10 to 15 feet crater on the spot.

nodes.description: 首席部长要求调查并提交报告至都城警察局长
nodes.support_text: Chief Minister Shahbaz Sharif took notice of the incident and sought its report from Capital City Police Officer Amin Wains.

nodes.description: 官员怀疑爆炸物原计划用于袭击前总理纳瓦兹·谢里夫车队
nodes.support_text: they feared that the explosives-laden truck might have been arranged to target the caravan of ousted prime minister Nawaz Sharif.

nodes.description: 谢里夫原定周日从伊斯兰堡返回的巡游路线经过爆炸地点
nodes.support_text: His rally would have passed by the point as per the earlier plan.

nodes.description: 市议会议长宣布将全面调查爆炸事件
nodes.support_text: Lord Mayor Mubashir Javed told reporters they would investigate the blast from all angles.

edges.support_text: when an explosion occurred in a truck at a parking stand on Outfall Road on Monday evening.
three or four cars parked by the truck went airborne about 10 to 15 feet due to the impact of the blast.
the roof of a school building in the vicinity also collapsed due to the blast.
the high voltage wires (132kV)... were damaged leaving the area in darkness.
the powerful explosion left a 10 to 15 feet crater on the spot.
three or four cars parked by the truck went airborne about 10 to 15 feet due to the impact of the blast.
the high voltage wires (132kV)... were damaged leaving the area in darkness.
the roof of a school building in the vicinity also collapsed due to the blast.
a huge cache of explosives had been stored in the truck... trying to assess the exact weight of the explosives.
The injured were taken to Services and Mian Munshi hospitals from where 12 of them were discharged after first aid.
the attackers might have been intending to transport the explosives to other areas of the city.
Chief Minister Shahbaz Sharif took notice of the incident and sought its report from Capital City Police Officer Amin Wains.
His rally would have passed by the point as per the earlier plan.
